headline: Slow Cooker BBQ Chicken Thighs
name: Slow Cooker BBQ Chicken Thighs
description: These simple slow cooker BBQ chicken thighs made with basic condiments and spices are full of flavor with super tender, fall-off-the-bone meat.
recipeIngredient: 9 Tyson® Fresh Boneless, Skinless Chicken Thighs

recipeInstructions.text: Stir barbecue sauce, honey, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce together in a bowl until well combined.
Season chicken all over with salt and pepper. Place into a slow cooker and pour barbecue mixture over top; stir to until well coated.

Cover and cook on Low until chicken is no longer pink inside and the juices run clear, about 5 hours. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the middle should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
